name: 68 Creative Group, Inc.
description:
68 Creative Group, Inc. is an Internet Marketing Agency located in Tempe, AZ.
Their specialties include Digital Marketing, Brand Marketing, Website Design, and Sales and Support.
Some of their clients include Captivate, DPAA, Crystal Rock Water, NewCruit, Stucky Insurance, and MJS Designs.
“Your marketing should be practical, deliberate and designed for your unique business.”
